quotes.author: 벤저민 그레이엄
quotes.original: In the short run, the market is a voting machine, but in the long run, it is a weighing machine.

quotes.quote: 가격이 내재가치보다 낮을 때 사고, 높을 때 팔아라.
quotes.author: 벤저민 그레이엄
quotes.original: Buy when the price is below intrinsic value, sell when it's above.

quotes.author: 벤저민 그레이엄
quotes.original: The margin of safety is the central concept of investment.

quotes.quote: 시장이 두려워할 때 탐욕스러워지고, 시장이 탐욕스러울 때 두려워하라.
quotes.author: 워렌 버핏
quotes.original: Be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful.

quotes.quote: 가격은 당신이 지불하는 것이고, 가치는 당신이 얻는 것이다.
quotes.author: 워렌 버핏
quotes.original: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
